name: Lagaan
title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
overview: Villagers challenge British colonials to a critical cricket match that decides their future.

name: 3 Idiots
title: 3 Idiots
overview: Three college friends discover the true meaning of life in the midst of a rigid education system.

name: Swades
title: Swades
overview: A NASA scientist returns home to India and embarks on a journey of self-discovery.

name: Dangal
title: Dangal
overview: An ex-wrestler coaches his daughters, pushing them to excel in a male-dominated sport.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
overview: Three friends take a life-changing road trip across Spain, confronting their fears and pasts.

name: Dil Chahta Hai
title: Dil Chahta Hai
overview: Three inseparable childhood friends navigate love and life post-college in urban India.

name: Chak De! India
title: Chak De! India
overview: A disgraced ex-hockey player coaches the Indian women’s hockey team to prove their worth.

name: PK
title: PK
overview: An alien on Earth challenges religious dogma, searching for answers about humanity and faith.

name: Gully Boy
title: Gully Boy
overview: A talented Mumbai street rapper fights to rise above his socio-economic status and chase his dreams.

name: Andaz Apna Apna
title: Andaz Apna Apna
overview: Two dreamers cross paths vying for wealth and love, leading to comedic misadventures.

name: Queen
title: Queen
overview: A sheltered Delhi girl goes on her honeymoon alone after her fiancé calls off the wedding.

name: Tumbbad
title: Tumbbad
overview: A mythological treasure hunt unravels horrifying secrets in a remote Maharashtrian village.

name: Sholay
title: Sholay
overview: Two criminals are hired to capture a ruthless bandit, forging an iconic tale of friendship.

name: Baahubali: The Beginning
title: Baahubali: The Beginning
overview: A daring young man uncovers his royal lineage as he fights to save a kingdom from tyranny.

name: Baahubali 2
title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
overview: The saga concludes as the rightful heir battles deceit and betrayal to reclaim the throne.

name: Magadheera
title: Magadheera
overview: A warrior reincarnates centuries later, determined to fulfill his oath to protect his beloved.

name: Arjun Reddy
title: Arjun Reddy
overview: A brilliant but hotheaded medical student self-destructs after a bitter breakup.

name: Mahanati
title: Mahanati
overview: The life story of legendary actress Savitri, capturing her meteoric rise and tragic downfall.

name: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
overview: A charming man discovers his real lineage, transforming family dynamics and his own fortunes.

name: Rangasthalam
title: Rangasthalam
overview: A partially hearing-impaired villager challenges a tyrannical local leader, reshaping rural politics.

name: Eega
title: Eega
overview: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly to avenge his death and protect his beloved.

name: Pokiri
title: Pokiri
overview: An undercover cop infiltrates a dangerous gang, unraveling a larger conspiracy in the city.

name: A Aa
title: A Aa
overview: A young woman’s trip to her aunt’s village sparks romance and self-discovery.

name: Businessman
title: Businessman
overview: A determined man arrives in Mumbai to take control of the city’s underworld, driven by ambition.

name: Gamyam
title: Gamyam
overview: A rich youngster, searching for his lost love, travels with a petty thief and learns life's bigger lessons.
